en: Hear ye the word which Jehovah speaketh unto you, O house of Israel:
hmr: Aw Israel sûngkuo, LALPAIN i kuoma thu a hril chu lo ngai ta,

en: thus saith Jehovah, Learn not the way of the nations, and be not dismayed at the signs of heaven; for the nations are dismayed at them.
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Hnamhai lampuihai chu inchûk naw la, chungtienga inchiknahaia chun lunginzîng el bawk naw rawh, hnam- hai chu chuonghaia chun an lungin- zîng hlak sih a.

en: For the customs of the peoples are vanity; for one cutteth a tree out of the forest, the work of the hands of the workman with the axe.
hmr: Hnamhai dânhai chu teplo mei mei an na; rama inthawkin thing an hang phûr thlûk a, themthiem mi chun a hreipuiin a chei a.

en: They deck it with silver and with gold; they fasten it with nails and with hammers, that it move not.
hmr: Chu chu tangkaruo le rângka- chakin an chei a; thîrkilnahaiin an sukdet a, tubauhai leh, chuongchun, ân hnîng thei nawh a;

en: They are like a palm-tree, of turned work, and speak not: they must needs be borne, because they cannot go. Be not afraid of them; for they cannot do evil, neither is it in them to do good.
hmr: Leipuia vate ṭi milim ang an na, nisienlakhawm, an ṭawng nawh a; an fe thei naw leiin zâwn an ngai a. Anni chu ṭi naw la, thil suol khawm an thaw thei nawh a, annia chun thil ṭha thawna ding khawm a um bawk nawh.

en: There is none like unto thee, O Jehovah; thou art great, and thy name is great in might.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nanga ang hi tu- khawm an um nawh, i ropuia, i hming chu thilthawtheinain a ropui bawk a.

en: Who should not fear thee, O King of the nations? for to thee doth it appertain; forasmuch as among all the wise men of the nations, and in all their royal estate, there is none like unto thee.
hmr: Aw hnamhai Laltak, tuin am ṭi nâwng an ti cheh a? Nang chun i phu hrim sih a, hnamhai laia mi var po po lai le, an lalram sûngahai chun, nang- a ang hrim tukhawm an um nawh.

en: But they are together brutish and foolish: the instruction of idols! it is but a stock.
hmr: Anni chu ngawngtak le invêt an na, milim inchûktirna chu thing bul el chu a nih.

en: There is silver beaten into plates, which is brought from Tarshish, and gold from Uphaz, the work of the artificer and of the hands of the goldsmith; blue and purple for their clothing; they are all the work of skilful men.
hmr: Tangkaruo thlênghaia sut, Tar- sisa inthawka hung lâkhai le, Uphaza inthawka rângkachak, themthiem le rângkachak thîrsu kuthai sinthaw chu: a dum pâwl le a dum êm chu an thuom dingin, mi themthiemhai kutsuok vawng an nih.

en: But Jehovah is the true God; he is the living God, and an everlasting King: at his wrath the earth trembleth, and the nations are not able to abide his indignation.
hmr: Amiruokchu, LALPA chau Pathien diktak chu a na, Pathien hring chu a na, chatuon lal a nih; a lunginsenna chun hnuoi chu ân thin a, a lungawi nawna chu hnamhai chun an tuor thei nawh.

en: Thus shall ye say unto them, The gods that have not made the heavens and the earth, these shall perish from the earth, and from under the heavens.
hmr: Hieng hin an kuoma chun hril i tih: hnuoi le vânhai siemtu ni lo pathienhai chu, chuonghai chu vân- khuphnuoia inthawk le leihnuoia inthawk chun bohmang an tih.

en: He hath made the earth by his power, he hath established the world by his wisdom, and by his understanding hath he stretched out the heavens.
hmr: A thilthawtheina chun hnuoi chu a siem a, a varna chun khawvêl chu a lo tungding tah a, a hrietthiem- nahai chun vânhai khawm chu a lo keiphar tah a;

en: When he uttereth his voice, there is a tumult of waters in the heavens, and he causeth the vapors to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain, and bringeth forth the wind out of his treasuries.
hmr: a râwl a hung insuo pha chun vânhaia tuihai chu a hung phul a, leihnuoi tâwpnaa inthawk dâm chun tuihu chu ân kaitir a, ruo ta ding chun kâwlinlephai a siem a, a robâwmhaia inthawk chun thli chu a hung lâk suok a.

en: Every man is become brutish and is without knowledge; every goldsmith is put to shame by his graven image; for his molten image is falsehood, and there is no breath in them.
hmr: Mi tin el chu ngawngtak, hriet- na nei lo an na; rângkachak suttu tinhai khawm chu a milim kera siem lei chun sukzakin a um a; a milim sunghai chu khêlthu ngawt a na, an- nia chun inthuokna a um si nawh a.

en: They are vanity, a work of delusion: in the time of their visitation they shall perish.
hmr: Thil teplo, sinthaw nuizatum an nih; hrem an ni pha chun bohmang an tih.

en: The portion of Jacob is not like these; for he is the former of all things; and Israel is the tribe of his inheritance: Jehovah of hosts is his name.
hmr: Jakob chanvo chu hieng ang hi a ni ve nawh a; thil po pohai siemtu chu a na; Israel chu a rochan hnam a na; sipaihai LALPA chu a hming a nih.

en: Gather up thy wares out of the land, O thou that abidest in the siege.
hmr: Aw nang inhuola um, rama inthawk chun i thuomhnawhai chu la khâwm rawh.

en: For thus saith Jehovah, Behold, I will sling out the inhabitants of the land at this time, and will distress them, that they may feel it.
hmr: LALPA chun hieng hin a ti sih a: Hieng ang huna hin ram hluotuhai chu the suok ka ta, an tuorna dingin anni chu sukrinum ka tih.

en: Woe is me because of my hurt! my wound is grievous: but I said, Truly this is my grief, and I must bear it.
hmr: Ka natna lei chun ka chung a va rik de! ka hliemna chu a nasa hle a; nisienlakhawm, “Indiktakin hi hi ka natna chu a na, ka tuor ding hrim a nih,” ka tih a.

en: My tent is destroyed, and all my cords are broken: my children are gone forth from me, and they are not: there is none to spread my tent any more, and to set up my curtains.
hmr: Ka puon in chu suksiet a ni tah a; ka hruihai po po khawm suktan an ni tah a; ka nauhai khawm chu keimaa inthawkin an fe hmang a, an um ta nawh a; ka puon in keiphar nâwk ding tukhawm an um ta nawh a, ka puonzârhai zâr ding leh.

en: For the shepherds are become brutish, and have not inquired of Jehovah: therefore they have not prospered, and all their flocks are scattered.
hmr: Berâmpuhai hlak chu an ngawng êm a, LALPA chu an râwn si nawh a; chuleiin, an hlawtling nawh a, an berâm ruolhai po po chu an indar zo a.

en: The voice of tidings, behold, it cometh, and a great commotion out of the north country, to make the cities of Judah a desolation, a dwelling-place of jackals.
hmr: Thuthang râwl chu, ngai ta, a hung mêk a nih, Juda ram chu râusan le sihalhai chêngna hmuna siem dingin hmâr ram tienga inthawk buoina nasatak a hung mêk a nih.

en: O Jehovah, I know that the way of man is not in himself; it is not in man that walketh to direct his steps.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mihriem lampui chu amaa chun a um nawh ti ka hriet a; a kepênhai sukdik dingin mihriem- a chun infetirtu chu a um nawh.

en: O Jehovah, correct me, but in measure; not in thine anger, lest thou bring me to nothing.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi sukdik la, ami- ruokchu, rorêlnain, i lunginsennain ni loin, chuong naw chun iengkhawm ni loin mi siem rawi i tih.

en: Pour out thy wrath upon the nations that know thee not, and upon the families that call not on thy name; for they have devoured Jacob, yea, they have devoured him and consumed him, and have laid waste his habitation.
hmr: Khawhri be mi, nang hre lohai chunga le, hnam nangma hming lam ngailohai chunga chun i ṭiumna chu bunthla la, Jakob chu an fâk zo sih a; anih, ama chu an fâk zo a, an kâng- hmang dêr a, a umna khawm chu an suksiet a.
